analysisEngineMetaData.name: TagenAED
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Named Entities Recognizer.
calls the TagEN NER script. Designed to run TagEN v. 2
This AE encapsulates TagEN, a Named Entities Recognizer (with default configs for French and English).
Errors are carefully processed, though bugs are always possible (sic!): detailed UIMA exceptions are thrown whenever possible, even when the underlying TagEN process fails (in this case stderr is copied in the exception message).
A time out option is provided, in order to kill the underlying process after a certain amount of time. Of course it should be used with care, since the time needed to process a document depends on a lot of parameters (set to 0 by default, meaning no limit).
Temporary files/directory are created "in the safe way", using Java specs mechanism to manage location and filenames. TagEN 2.0 is also safe about temporary files, therefore no conflict should arise. An option is also provided to force temporary data location. Finally a debug option is provided, which is also transmitted to TagEN, and permits to keep temporary files. It can be used to observe the intermediate steps of the process.
Information: currently this AE requires that the text does not contain any ">" character, because it is the opening tag mark. "<" characters are allowed.

configurationParameter.name: UnitexDir
configurationParameter.description: Path to Unitex directory. If not set, TagEN must know where Unitex is (for example with a 'unitex' symlink, see TagEN doc)

configurationParameter.name: TagenConfig
configurationParameter.description: Configuration file for TagEN. Must be a valid custom config file. Do not set this parameter to use TagEN standard config files for French or English, since by default this AE will use the document language (or the Language parameter if it is set).

configurationParameter.name: TempDir
configurationParameter.description: Temporary directory to be used by TagEN. Leave undefined to use the default temporary directory.

configurationParameter.name: TimeOut
configurationParameter.description: Time limit before interrupting TagEN process (seconds). Default = 0 = no time limit.

configurationParameter.name: Language
configurationParameter.description: Use if no language is specified in the documents (e.g. by the collection reader), or if you need to override language.

configurationParameter.name: CharacterCodingErrorReplacementValue
configurationParameter.description: Replacement value for character coding errors. Must contain only one character. If defined, this value will be used to replace unmappable characters in order to avoid this kind of error. Otherwise such errors will raise an exception, thus usually making the process fail.
